messages.subject: HELP!
messages.msgSnippet: Are there any HTML savvy folk out there? Apparently some how, some way I have offended the Great Cyber Gods of the Universe and they re playing fast and loose
messages.messageBody:
Are there any HTML savvy folk out there? Apparently some how, some way I
have offended the Great Cyber Gods of the Universe and they're playing
fast and loose with the SHQ website as it relates to Internet Explorer.

I used the same web page program to do the SHQ site as I used on my
author web site and that works fine with both Netscape and IE but the
SHQ site is getting totally screwed especially the fiction main menu
and subdivisions--they will not work anymore with IE and I swear I
didn't do anything to the files.

If you are someone or know someone who might be able to give me a much
needed clue or 12 on fixing this problem please contact me offlist

Bsher213@...

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
